item.title: [NDTV] New Delhi Television Ltd Receives Show Cause Notice for Alleged Tax Violations
item.description:
New Delhi Television Limited has received scrutiny notices in Form GST ASMT-10 dated January 7, 2026, issued by the Assistant Commissioner / GSTO, Ward 300 (E-Commerce), Zone 10, Delhi. The notices pertain to the financial years 2022-23 and 2023-24 and allege wrongful availment and utilisation of excess Input Tax Credit (ITC) and short payment of tax. The proposed liability includes tax, interest, and penalty, amounting to approximately INR 13.69 crore for FY 2022-23 and INR 20.25 crore for FY 2023-24. The Company is examining the allegations and will take appropriate legal and procedural steps. There is no immediate impact on the Company's financial position, operations, or other activities.

  • New Delhi Television Ltd has received scrutiny notices for the financial years 2022-23 and 2023-24.
  • The notices allege wrongful availment and utilisation of excess Input Tax Credit (ITC) and short payment of tax.
  • The proposed liability includes tax, interest, and penalty, amounting to approximately INR 13.69 crore for FY 2022-23 and INR 20.25 crore for FY 2023-24.
  • The Company is examining the allegations and will take appropriate legal and procedural steps.
  • There is no immediate impact on the Company's financial position, operations, or other activities.

item.title: [POWERMECH] Power Mech Projects Secures 1 GWh BESS Order from West Bengal State Electricity Distribution Company
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Power Mech Projects Limited (PMPL), a leading industrial engineering, construction and services company, has announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, PM Green Private Limited, has secured a contract for 1 GWh Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) from West Bengal State Electricity Distribution Company Limited (WBSEDCL). The project, valued at Rs. 1,563 Cr (Rs. 3,126 Cr including Greenshoe option), is structured as a Build, Own, Operate (BOO) model with a 100% off-take guarantee from WBSEDCL. The scope of work includes design, finance, engineering, procurement, construction, operation, and maintenance of the BESS facility at the Goaltore Substation. There is an additional greenshoe option for a further 1 GWh to be established at Durgapur Project Limited Campus, Durgapur.

item.title: [ELPROINTL] Elpro International Ltd Acquires Sundrop Brands Limited for INR 39.18 Crores
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Elpro International Ltd has acquired 5,47,946 equity shares of Sundrop Brands Limited (Formely known as Agro Tech Foods Limited), a public limited company involved in manufacturing, marketing, and selling a wide range of Food Products and Edible Oils. The acquisition was made for a cash consideration of INR 39.18 Crores, increasing Elpro's total holding to 5,56,946 equity shares. Sundrop Brands, established in 1986, has a consolidated turnover of INR 898.87 Crores, INR 759.67 Crores, and INR 849.71 Crores in the last three financial years, respectively. The company is listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) and Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and has a presence in India and one plant and office outside India.

item.title: [POWERMECH] Power Mech Projects Ltd Subsidiary Receives Large-Scale Order for 250 MW BESS from WBSEDCL
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Power Mech Projects Ltd's subsidiary, PM Green Private Limited, has received a large-scale order from West Bengal State Electricity Distribution Company Limited (WBSEDCL) for the setting up of a 250 MW / 1,000 MWh Standalone Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) at Goaltore, Paschim Medinipur, West Bengal. The order is under the Build-Own-Operate (BOO) model, with an additional Greenshoe option of 250 MW / 1,000 MWh at the Durgapur Project Limited (DPL) campus, Durgapur, West Bengal. The scope of work includes design, finance, engineering, procurement, construction, operation, and maintenance of the BESS facility. The scheduled commissioning date is 18 months from the date of signing of the Battery Energy Storage Purchase Agreement (BESPA), with an operation and maintenance period of 180 months from the SCD. The total consideration is 3,126 Crores (Excluding GST) (Including Greenshoe option).

  • Power Mech Projects Ltd's subsidiary, PM Green Private Limited, receives a large-scale order from WBSEDCL for a 250 MW / 1,000 MWh Standalone Battery Energy Storage System (BESS).

item.title: [GENESIS] Genesis Ibrc India Ltd Promoters Reclassified to Public Category After Share Transfer to Acquirers
item.description:
Genesis Ibrc India Ltd announced the reclassification of its promoters, Mr. Mastan Rao Pesala, Ms. Pesala Venkata Subbamma, Mr. Arun Kumar Pesala and Mr. Srikanth Pesala from the Promoter Category to the Public Category. This reclassification follows the execution of a Share Purchase Agreement with Mr. Padmanabhan Krishnamoorthy and Ms. Venkatraman Varalakshmi on 06th March 2025. The promoters transferred their entire shareholding, amounting to 14,73,000 shares, to the acquirers on 08th January 2026. This transfer was completed in compliance with SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares Transfer) Regulations, 2011.

  • Genesis Ibrc India Ltd promoters reclassified to Public Category.
  • Share Purchase Agreement executed with acquirers on 06th March 2025.
  • Promoters transferred entire shareholding of 14,73,000 shares to acquirers on 08th January 2026.
  • Transfer completed in compliance with SEBI regulations.
  • Reclassification follows open offer requirements regulations.

item.title: [SHRIPISTON] Shriram Pistons & Rings Ltd Completes Acquisition of Grupo Antolin-lrausa SA and Grupo Antolin Ingenieria SA Shares
item.description:
Shriram Pistons & Rings Ltd has completed the acquisition of the entire outstanding capital of Antolin Lighting India Private Limited (T1) and Grupo Antolin India Private Limited (T2), and consequently, indirectly acquired ~99.99% of the outstanding capital of Grupo Antolin Chakan Private Limited (T3). T1 has become the wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company, T2 has become the wholly-owned subsidiary and an unlisted material subsidiary of the Company, and T3 has become the step-down subsidiary of the Company. This acquisition was executed in accordance with the terms and conditions of a Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) with Grupo Antolin-lrausa SA and Grupo Antolin Ingenieria SA.
